verses.verse: Great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of his holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> for situation <S%H5131><s%>, the joy <S%H4885><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>, is mountain <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, on the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> King <S%H4428><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> in her palaces <S%H759><s%> for a refuge <S%H4869><s%>.
For <S%H4428><s%>, behold, the kings were assembled <S%H3259><s%>, they passed by <S%H5674><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.
They saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8539><s%>, and so they marveled; they were troubled <S%H926><s%>, and hurried away <S%H2648><s%>.
Fear <S%H7461><s%> took hold <S%H270><s%> upon them there <S%H2427><s%>, and pain, as of a woman in hardship <S%H3205><s%>.
You break <S%H7665><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> with a east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>.

As we have heard <S%H8085><s%>, so have we seen <S%H7200><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>: God <S%H430><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> it for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
We have thought <S%H1819><s%> of your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of your temple <S%H1964><s%>.

According to your name <S%H8034><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, so is your praise <S%H8416><s%> unto the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: your right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>.
Let mountain <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, let the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%>, because of your judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
Walk about <S%H5437><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and go round about <S%H5362><s%> her <S%H5608><s%>: tell the towers there <S%H4026><s%>.

Mark <S%H7896><s%> you well <S%H3820><s%> her bulwarks <S%H2430><s%>, consider <S%H6448><s%> her palaces <S%H759><s%>; that you may tell <S%H5608><s%> it to the generation <S%H1755><s%> following <S%H314><s%>.
For this God <S%H430><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>: he will be our guide <S%H5090><s%> even unto death <S%H4192><s%>.
